author: Khyathi Dalal
title: 'LINK Is On Fire Baby, Let's Go $20': Analysts Get Stoked As Chainlink Rallies 8% - Benzinga
text:
Whales are interested in Chainlink LINK/USD , prompting analysts to turn bullish on the token ‚Äî though some see it in a re-accumulation range .
What Happened : Based on LookOnChain data cited by crypto analyst Ali Martinez , Chainlink whales have gathered around 7 million LINK worth $105 million just over the past week. This highlights the rising confidence of major LINK players.
Data indicated that an unknown wallet address withdrew 136,146 LINK (worth $2.05 million) from Binance, taking its past 10-day withdrawal to 348,006 LINK (worth $5.79 million) from Binance.
The value indicates a floating profit of $229,000.
Read Next: Dogecoin, XRP Witness Significant Whale Activity: Analysts Expect 'Something Big'
Why It Matters : Rekt Capital , a cryptocurrency technical analyst, published a chart with technical analysis on X, asking : ‚ÄúWhat if Chainlink has been a Re-Accumulation range at highs all this time?‚Äù
$LINK
What if Chainlink has been a Re-Accumulation range at highs all this time? #LINK #Crypto #Chainlink pic.twitter.com/9iRb4oxhU1
‚Äî Rekt Capital (@rektcapital) December 27, 2023 For the unfamiliar, re-accumulation is a range-bound condition that forms after an uptrend. It is a pause or preparation phase for a fresh new leg of a larger uptrend.
Futures Trader, Satoshi Flipper took to his X handle and said that ‚Äú$LINK is on fire baby let's gooo $20.‚Äù
Later Flipper added that ‚ÄúTechnically the market wasn't wrong and $LINK did hit the top of the channel, almost $18 as presented on 12/21. Bottom of the channel is $14 ... a blessing for swing traders if we get it.‚Äù
Bottom of the channel is $14 ... a blessing for swing traders if we get it üôèüôè https://t.co/NGdgJ32Zly pic.twitter.com/VfZZ8modKw
‚Äî Satoshi Flipper (@SatoshiFlipper) December 28, 2023 Price Action In the past week, LINK witnessed a 7.9% increase taking its past month gains to 11.4%. In the past 24 hours, the LINK price peaked at an intraday high of $17.54, reflecting an increase of 7.1%. Currently, the token is trading marginally higher over the past 24 hours (+0.4%), with volumes rising 56.2% in the same timeframe. Based on Etherscan data, total LINK holders as of Dec. 28 stood at 707,929 compared to 704,721 holders two weeks ago. The top holder is Binance 8 with 43.4 million LINK worth $706.5 million. Image: Shutterstock

author: MENAFN
title: Egypt Warns Once More Against Region's Slide Into Serious Clashes
text:
( MENAFN - Kuwait News Agency (KUNA)) CAIRO, Sept 26 (KUNA) -- Egypt has cautioned again against slithering the Middle East region into armed clashes with serious consequences that could be uncontrollable if the Israeli Occupation brutal aggression on the Gaza Strip and Lebanon does not stop.
In a statement issued on Thursday, Egypt's Foreign Ministry said ongoing Israeli aggression against Palestinian people in Gaza and its military escalation in Lebanon might lead to risky repercussions on the region's peoples.
Egypt will carry on its efforts along with international and regional parties to stop this risky escalation, it said.
Egypt called for an immediate, permanent and inclusive halt of Israeli occupation attacks on Gaza and Lebanon, it stated.
Cairo reiterated its support to all proposed initiatives and preparations aiming to reach a comprehensive and permanent ceasefire in the region, it elaborated, referring to ongoing communication with concerned bodies in this regard.
Reaching lull in the region is related to the stop of Israeli occupation on Gaza and the implementation of relevant UN Security Council resolutions, the statement noted. (end)

author: Da Reda√ß√£o
title: Quem s√£o os influenciadores que foram presos na opera√ß√£o "Falsas Promessas 2" | Band
text:
Vinte e duas pessoas foram presas pela Pol√≠cia Civil da Bahia, entre elas, cinco policiais militares, na manh√£ desta quarta-feira (9), na Opera√ß√£o ‚ÄúFalsas Promessas 2‚Äù, que visa desarticular uma organiza√ß√£o criminosa envolvida em rifas ilegais e lavagem de dinheiro.
Durante a opera√ß√£o, cerca de 300 agentes cumpriram 22 mandados de pris√£o preventiva e executaram 30 mandados de busca e apreens√£o, al√©m de seis medidas cautelares diversas da pris√£o.
As investiga√ß√µes da Pol√≠cia Civil mostram que o grupo utilizava as redes sociais para divulgar rifas de alto valor, como ve√≠culos de luxo, sendo os sorteios manipulados, a fim de favorecer membros da pr√≥pria organiza√ß√£o.
Empresas de fachada e pessoas eram utilizadas para ocultar a origem dos valores il√≠citos. Al√©m disso, segundo a organiza√ß√£o, o grupo criminoso teria movimentado R$ 680 milh√µes.
Veja quais s√£o os influenciadores presos na opera√ß√£o:
Ramhon Dias
Ramhon Dias, tem 428 mil seguidores em uma das redes sociais e est√° entre os presos pela opera√ß√£o, conforme a TV Bahia. Na p√°gina do Instagram, ele se descreve como empres√°rio e ‚Äúm√°quina de pr√™mios‚Äù. Ele chegou a ser preso na primeira fase da opera√ß√£o, em setembro de 2024, mas foi solto, com uso de tornozeleira eletr√¥nica, um m√™s depois.
Conforme o jornal A Tarde, o homem tamb√©m teria sido preso em julho de 2023, por suspeita de lavagem ou oculta√ß√£o de bens, corrup√ß√£o, jogos de azar e associa√ß√£o criminosa, al√©m de responder outros processos criminais.
Franklin Reis
Outro influenciador preso na opera√ß√£o, conforme a TV Bahia, foi Franklin Reis, que ficou conhecido nas redes sociais com conte√∫dos humor√≠sticos. Com os personagens Neka e Abias, hoje ele soma mais de um milh√£o de seguidores no Instagram.
Na biografia da rede social, Franklin divulga: ‚ÄúA√ß√£o Golf + 2 motos‚Äù e direciona os seguidores para o link de uma p√°gina de pr√™mios. No √∫ltimo m√™s, o jovem chegou a participar do Rancho do Maia, de Carlinhos Maia.
Nanam e Gabriela
Jos√© Roberto Santos, mais conhecido como Nanam Premia√ß√µes, e Gabriela Silva tamb√©m est√£o entre os presos.O casal usava as redes sociais para divulgar rifas, al√©m de mostrar os pr√™mios com detalhes em fotos e v√≠deos.
Nanam compartilhou uma nota sobre a pris√£o em seu Instagram que soma mais de um milh√£o de seguidores. O comunicado dos advogados diz que a defesa n√£o concorda com a pris√£o e alega, ainda, que o homem tem se ‚Äúcomportado de forma diligente e colaborativa‚Äù com as autoridades.
A defesa ainda afirma que os sorteios s√£o regulamentados e est√£o conforme as exig√™ncias legais, sendo fiscalizados pelos √≥rg√£os competentes, al√©m de alegar inoc√™ncia.
‚ÄúMais uma vez a persegui√ß√£o do sistema, at√© quando o pobre que saiu da mis√©ria vai ser tachado de marginal‚Äù, disse Gabriel aos seus 53 mil seguidores na rede social.
Apesar disso, ainda segundo a TV Bahia, casal √© apontado como chefe do esquema.
Josem√°rio Lins
O influenciador Josem√°rio Lins, que tem mais de 654 mil seguidores no Instagram, tamb√©m foi preso. De acordo com a TV Bahia, o homem estava em Juazeiro, na Bahia. Nas redes sociais, ele divulgava rifas e fotos de viagens para os Estados Unidos e Dubai.
O homem tamb√©m divulga sorteios na biografia e afirma que √© ‚Äú100% legalizado‚Äù. Josem√°rio, que j√° havia sido preso na primeira etapa da opera√ß√£o, escreve na descri√ß√£o do perfil: ‚ÄúA f√°brica de sonhos est√° de volta‚Äù.
Alexandre Tchaca
Um dos policiais presos √© L√°zaro Andrade, conhecido como Alexandre Tchaca, que tem 169 mil seguidores nas redes sociais, onde fala sobre crime, a√ß√µes policiais e seguran√ßa p√∫blica.
No Instagram ele s√≥ diz que √© casado e pai de tr√™s filhos. Al√©m disso, ele divulga o ‚ÄúPodtchaca‚Äù, podcast no qual o policial recebe convidados para falar sobre temas como educa√ß√£o e seguran√ßa p√∫blica.
Alexandre j√° foi candidato a vereador de Salvador, mas n√£o venceu.

author: Anay Mridul
title: Vegans More Likely to Face Contempt & Harm Than Meat-Eaters ‚Äì How Should Brands Respond?
text:
Vegan Consumer Trends & Insights Research & Scientific Studies By Anay Mridul Published on Dec 20, 2024 Last updated Dec 19, 2024 Courtesy: Shotprime/Green Queen
5 Mins Read A new study shows that meat-eaters recognise that vegans are health- and environmentally conscious, but also view them with fear and contempt. There seems to be a sort of emotional rivalry between people who eat meat and those who choose to opt for plant-based alternatives, with the latter being viewed as ‚Äúsocially deviant‚Äù from the former ‚Äì and this has hurt sales of vegan meat products.
These are the findings of a study published by University of Vaasa researchers in the Food Quality and Preference journal, which adopted a bias-centred methodology to explore why people are ‚Äúmore inclined to consider harming‚Äù vegans than meat-eaters and flexitarians.
The researchers asked 900 people each from the UK, Finland, Germany and Sweden to evaluate their beliefs about fictional consumers based on their shopping lists, each of which contained pasta, bread, apple juice, carrots and bananas.
The differences were in the proteins: there were plant protein balls and vegetarian sausages on the vegan shopping list, chicken balls and plant-based sausages on the flexitarian list, and conventional meatballs and sausages on meat-eaters‚Äô list.
Vegans most admired, yet most envied Courtesy: Food Quality and Preference For the analysis, the Finnish researchers used the BIAS Map framework, which is devised to assess what kind of social prejudices and perceptual biases exist towards a specific group ‚Äì vegans, in this case. They then looked at whether observers‚Äô need for status and affiliations lighten perceptions of meat-eaters.
‚ÄúMeat (alternative) consumption represents a social area where highly mixed and charged meanings are sent/signalled and received/interpreted,‚Äù the study reads.
Vegans were seen as more climate-friendly and health-conscious with high moral standards, and also commanded the most amount of admiration among the shopper groups. But on the flip side, these eco-minded consumers elicited more fear, contempt, envy and anger than others too.
Shoppers only buying meat were rated the lowest on the climate, health and admiration scale, but they were also the least likely to evoke the negative feelings vegans did. Flexitarians landed somewhere in between.
The fictional vegan consumers were considered more competent but less warm, which the researchers said suggests ‚Äúenvious prejudice‚Äù towards ‚Äúmodel minorities‚Äù. Flexitarians, on the other hand, weren‚Äôt envied, but considered more socially approachable. ‚ÄúThis makes them an easier target to identify with, as they do not seem too extreme, and they also remind others of something familiar (e.g., meat-eating),‚Äù the study says.
Courtesy: Food Quality and Preference A concerning behavioural effect was the tendency for buyers of plant-based meat to induce both passive and active harm, which can range from social exclusion and ignorance to bullying and harassment.
Meanwhile, the psychologists found that participants with a high need for belonging in a group appear to be most welcoming of flexitarians, and those who crave a higher status showcase stronger feelings of anger and envy towards vegans.
This is because the latter group can be ‚Äúpainfully aware‚Äù that cutting back on meat is the ‚Äúideal and ‚Äòright'‚Äù solution to fighting climate change. ‚ÄúThis realisation could then explain their envious response toward meat alternative favorers, whose behaviours cannot be copied without some degree of self-sacrifice,‚Äù the study notes.
What does this mean for the plant-based meat category? Courtesy: Beyond Meat Scientific consensus states that reducing animal protein consumption is crucial if we want to ensure a liveable planet in the future. Meat and dairy production alone accounts for up to a fifth of total global emissions, and nearly 60% of the food system‚Äôs climate footprint.
While many consumers recognise this, they‚Äôre not yet sold on vegan alternatives to meat. In the last two years, this sector has witnessed a dip in sales and investor support , with the ‚Äòultra-processed‚Äô tag a particular thorn in its side .
To turn their fortunes around, brands need to market these products more creatively, weakening the climate messaging ( as some are doing ), and applying social influences like the idea of envious prejudice.
‚ÄúIt could be useful to experiment with highlighting the superiority of the meat alternative shopper in advertisements, as that would elicit both envy and admiration, depending on the observing individual, and might then motivate people to make better food choices,‚Äù the study suggests.
Portraying consumers of vegan products in softer and warmer terms could help too, ‚Äúhumanising the cold picture of vegetarian consumers by increasing perceptions of authenticity‚Äù.
Emphasising ‚Äì rather than challenging ‚Äì the stereotypes around vegans could reduce prejudice too. This could be in the form of humorous marketing, and utilising the concept of an ‚Äúextended contract‚Äù by reeling in celebrity endorsements (as Veganuary has successfully done), which can persuade omnivores to give these products a go.
‚ÄúCommunication emphasising how eating meat alternatives helps to assure the continuance of traditional ways of life, or how it helps to prevent major societal disruptions could reduce the perceived symbolic threat,‚Äù the researchers add, referring to how people seeking higher status find these products to be a threat.
Finally, vegan producers would do well to shift their focus away from vegans towards flexitarians, embracing the idea of reduction over elimination. ‚ÄúThe most promising avenue for transitioning from meat-intensive diets to more plant-based diets is through promoting a diet that does not entirely eliminate meat but replaces it with plant-based meat alternatives on a weekly basis,‚Äù write the authors.
Author Anay Mridul Anay is Green Queen's resident news reporter. Originally from India, he worked as a vegan food writer and editor in London, and is now travelling and reporting from across Asia. He's passionate about coffee, plant-based milk, cooking, eating, veganism, food tech, writing about all that, profiling people, and the Oxford comma.

author: Curtis Blandy
title: Five projects receive funding from City of Victoria to support youth of African descent
text:
Through the City of Victoria‚Äôs annual International Decade for People of African Descent (IDPAD), five local initiatives will receive grant funding to support, celebrate and empower African-descended youth.
Mayor Marianne Alto says the grant program aims to provide impactful and empowering opportunities for youth of African descent in Victoria by supporting programs that honour and celebrate the community.
This community-led grant program was created by, and is overseen by the IDPAD Advisory Committee who were responsible for selecting the five projects to receive funding this year.
In total, the IDPAD Advisory Committee had an allotment of $25,000 to award to the selected initiatives.
The City says, the five programs which were selected for 2024 were:
A cultural outreach event that celebrates the vitality of African traditions and intercultural dialogue in Canada and promotes higher education among youth of African descent A documentary about the impact of beauty standards on youth of African descent A mentorship and incubation project that empowers youth of African descent to explore possible career pathways with mentorship from professionals of African descent A minor league baseball tournament honouring the legacy of umpire Doug Hudlin, a prominent Canadian of African descent and member of the Canadian Baseball Hall of Fame A series of tours of local public learning spaces and arts-based workshops for youth of African descent ‚ÄúThe grant funding makes it possible for Black youth to experience art, science and history that they would not otherwise be encouraged to engage with,‚Äù said Aya Behr, grant recipient supported by Flux Media Gallery.
‚ÄúThe funding of Black Out will enrich Black youth‚Äôs understanding of the world and empower them to contribute their own perspectives and talent.‚Äù
This year is the last that this funding will be made available through the City of Victoria, as the decade-long program was only to last from 2015 to 2024.

author: J.M. Zuloaga
title: Aparecen 70 cristianos decapitados en el interior de una iglesia en el Congo
text:
Terrorismo
Aparecen 70 cristianos decapitados en el interior de una iglesia en el Congo
Las autoridades investigan la autor√≠a en una zona en la que opera habitualmente el Estado Isl√°mico
M√°s de 70 cad√°veres fueron encontrados en una iglesia en la aldea de Maiba, en la provincia de Kivu del Norte, en el este de la Rep√∫blica Democr√°tica del Congo, seg√∫n la estaci√≥n de radio Okapi.
Los medios de comunicaci√≥n informaron de que las v√≠ctimas fueron secuestradas hace tres d√≠as en el barrio de Lubero. Entre los muertos hab√≠a mujeres, ni√±os y ancianos. Las v√≠ctimas fueron atadas y decapitadas. Es el Estado Isl√°mico (Daesh, Isis) el que protagoniza este tipo de cr√≠menes en la zona.
La autor√≠a, sin embargo, no est√° a√∫n clara y las autoridades contemplan la posibilidadde que haya sido otro grupo de extremistas de los que operan en esa parte del pa√≠s.

author: Report reveals cause of Nepal‚Äôs deadly Yeti Airlines crash: the pilots mistakenly cut power ‚Äì Aviation24.be ‚Äì theskysters
title: Comment on Yeti Airlines ATR 72-500 carrying 72 passengers and crew crashes in Nepal; no survivors by Report reveals cause of Nepal‚Äôs deadly Yeti Airlines crash: the pilots mistakenly cut power ‚Äì Aviation24.be ‚Äì theskysters
text:
On 15 January, a Yeti Airlines ATR 72-500 (registered 9N-ANC) operated domestic flight YT691 between Kathmandu and Pokhara, Nepal. The aircraft carried 68 passengers and 4 crew members. While landing at Pokhara, the flight crashed on the bank of the Seti River. The accident resulted in the deaths of all passengers and crew members. It is Nepal‚Äôs worst air crash since the crash of Pakistan International Airlines Flight 268 in 1992.
While Pokhara Airport was closed after the crash, a rescue operation was launched. A difficult task as the crash site was difficult to reach.
The Government of Nepal summoned an emergency meeting. Indian aviation minister Jyotiraditya Scindia offered condolences.
Early reports indicated that some passengers and crew members survived the crash, but the Nepalese government has confirmed that nobody survived.
According to the passenger manifest, the four crew members and fifty-three passengers were Nepalese. Five Indian, four Russians, two Koreans, an Australian, Argentinian, French and Irish were among the victims.
The following videos appeared on social media, viewers discretion advised:
A video reportedly to be the final moments before the accident shows the aircraft banking and then rolling towards the ground.
[pic.twitter.com/f1pSXmrOVH]
‚Äî Breaking Aviation News & Videos (@aviationbrk)
[January 15, 2023]
The aircraft crashed into forested land located on the banks of the Seti Gandaki river that flows between the old domestic airport and Pokhra International Airport. As many as 36 bodies have been pulled from the crash site so far.
[https://t.co/xVoH4NKH67] [pic.twitter.com/a4JA7ki5Lm]
‚Äî Breaking Aviation News & Videos (@aviationbrk)
[January 15, 2023]

author: Moneywise
title: Investors in Kroger (NYSE:KR) have seen decent returns of 84% over the past five years
text:
Simply Wall St. Investors in Kroger (NYSE:KR) have seen decent returns of 84% over the past five years Read full article editorial-team@simplywallst.com (Simply Wall St) December 29, 2023 at 4:00 p.m. ¬∑ 3 min read The main point of investing for the long term is to make money. But more than that, you probably want to see it rise more than the market average. But The Kroger Co. ( NYSE:KR ) has fallen short of that second goal, with a share price rise of 65% over five years, which is below the market return. Meanwhile, the last twelve months saw the share price rise 1.2%.
So let's assess the underlying fundamentals over the last 5 years and see if they've moved in lock-step with shareholder returns.
View our latest analysis for Kroger
While markets are a powerful pricing mechanism, share prices reflect investor sentiment, not just underlying business performance. One imperfect but simple way to consider how the market perception of a company has shifted is to compare the change in the earnings per share (EPS) with the share price movement.
Kroger's earnings per share are down 9.8% per year, despite strong share price performance over five years.
This means it's unlikely the market is judging the company based on earnings growth. Because earnings per share don't seem to match up with the share price, we'll take a look at other metrics instead.
On the other hand, Kroger's revenue is growing nicely, at a compound rate of 4.8% over the last five years. In that case, the company may be sacrificing current earnings per share to drive growth.
The image below shows how earnings and revenue have tracked over time (if you click on the image you can see greater detail).
earnings-and-revenue-growth Kroger is well known by investors, and plenty of clever analysts have tried to predict the future profit levels. So we recommend checking out this free report showing consensus forecasts
What About Dividends? When looking at investment returns, it is important to consider the difference between total shareholder return (TSR) and share price return . Whereas the share price return only reflects the change in the share price, the TSR includes the value of dividends (assuming they were reinvested) and the benefit of any discounted capital raising or spin-off. Arguably, the TSR gives a more comprehensive picture of the return generated by a stock. We note that for Kroger the TSR over the last 5 years was 84%, which is better than the share price return mentioned above. And there's no prize for guessing that the dividend payments largely explain the divergence!
Story continues A Different Perspective Kroger provided a TSR of 3.7% over the last twelve months. But that return falls short of the market. If we look back over five years, the returns are even better, coming in at 13% per year for five years. It's quite possible the business continues to execute with prowess, even as the share price gains are slowing. I find it very interesting to look at share price over the long term as a proxy for business performance. But to truly gain insight, we need to consider other information, too. Case in point: We've spotted 2 warning signs for Kroger you should be aware of.
If you are like me, then you will not want to miss this free list of growing companies that insiders are buying.
Please note, the market returns quoted in this article reflect the market weighted average returns of stocks that currently trade on American exchanges.
Have feedback on this article? Concerned about the content? Get in touch with us directly. Alternatively, email editorial-team (at) simplywallst.com.

author: Jacinto Araque
title: El invento que va a acabar con los robos de m√≥viles: bloquea el dispositivo y avisa al banco
text:
Teniendo en cuenta lo mucho que se utiliza el m√≥vil en Espa√±a, ya sea para trabajar, comunicarse con los seres queridos o pagar en establecimientos, que este sea robado puede ser un duro varapalo para su propietario. Despu√©s de esto ser√° necesario tomar medidas como restaurar las cuentas de correo, poner una denuncia o comprar otro dispositivo.
Desde luego, puede salir caro. En Espa√±a, la cifra de sustracciones que se producen de estos dispositivos aumenta considerablemente en acontecimientos multitudinarios como festivales o ferias . Sin embargo, hay pa√≠ses, como Brasil, en los que la cifra llega a ser de m√°s de 2 millones de m√≥viles al a√±o.
Ahora, el gobierno de este pa√≠s ha querido tomar medidas en el asunto lanzando una aplicaci√≥n que dejar√° el m√≥vil inutilizable en caso de que el usuario sepa que est√° siendo robado, y que lo dejar√° como "un pedazo de metal in√∫til", seg√∫n Anderson Torres, ministro de Justicia y Seguridad P√∫blica.
Apoyo de los bancos En Brasil, el robo de smartphones se ha convertido en un problema que sufre mucha gente y que desemboca en una gran cantidad de tr√°mites. En algunos casos, pueden ser m√°s complejos si el dispositivo se ha robado de las manos de su due√±o estando encendido, algo que puede hacer que los ladrones tambi√©n gasten dinero de la cuenta bancaria.
Es por eso que el Ministerio de Justicia y Seguridad P√∫blica del pa√≠s ha decidido poner en marcha una aplicaci√≥n con la que quiere hacer que los m√≥viles robados queden totalmente inutilizados, de forma que los ladrones no tengan incentivo para acometer estos hurtos. Llevan trabajando en ella 6 meses, y gracias a esta, el proceso de anular la capacidad del smartphone para hacer llamadas y conectarse a las redes m√≥viles puede ser m√°s r√°pido, aunque el resto de caracter√≠sticas del dispositivo seguir√°n funcionando. Para anularlas, ser√° necesario bloquear el tel√©fono utilizando el gestor de dispositivos de Google o iOS.
M√≥vil sacando dinero del cajero iStock
Se trata de algo as√≠ como un bot√≥n del p√°nico, que se utiliza a trav√©s de una nueva aplicaci√≥n. Su nombre es Celular seguro, y ya est√° funcionando en el pa√≠s americano. El principal objetivo de la app, m√°s all√° de dejar el m√≥vil inutilizable para los ladrones, es agilizar todos los tr√°mites que ha de llevar a cabo la persona a la que se le ha robado el dispositivo.
Para su uso, se ha contado con la ayuda de la gran mayor√≠a de bancos del pa√≠s, que han prometido que tardar√°n entre diez minutos y media hora en cancelar el acceso a la aplicaci√≥n desde el dispositivo. Pronto, el gobierno espera tambi√©n poder contar con el apoyo de las operadoras para bloquear tambi√©n la tarjeta SIM de forma autom√°tica, de forma que no se puedan recibir SMS, que, en muchos casos, son utilizados como m√©todo de verificaci√≥n en dos pasos.
Configuraci√≥n simple Para poder utilizar la aplicaci√≥n correctamente es necesario configurarla aportando algunos datos personales que ayuden a identificar el dispositivo. De hecho, parece que lo m√°s recomendable es configurarla cuando antes para que los datos est√©n registrados el mayor tiempo posible. Es necesario crear una cuenta utilizando el n√∫mero de tel√©fono y una contrase√±a , para despu√©s a√±adir el n√∫mero IMEI del tel√©fono que se est√° utilizando. Este es algo as√≠ como el n√∫mero de bastidor del dispositivo, y si el m√≥vil tiene dual SIM, contar√° con dos. Gracias a este, es posible bloquear su uso de las redes m√≥viles en muchos pa√≠ses.
Una vez haya sido configurada, lo √∫nico importante es recordar la contrase√±a. Y es que, es posible reportar el robo del m√≥vil tanto desde el propio m√≥vil, justo cuando est√° pasando, como desde otro dispositivo, iniciando sesi√≥n con el n√∫mero de tel√©fono y dicha clave. La aplicaci√≥n est√° disponible tanto en iOS como en Android, y es totalmente gratuita.
Se trata de una gran iniciativa por parte del gobierno brasile√±o, gracias a la cual los usuarios que hayan sufrido un robo pueden reportarlo r√°pidamente y que el banco, sin necesidad de ped√≠rselo, act√∫e para proteger los intereses del usuario y as√≠ hacer estos tr√°mites algo m√°s f√°ciles de llevar. Hay que tener en cuenta que un reporte en esta aplicaci√≥n no sustituye una denuncia en una comisar√≠a de polic√≠a, sino que son dos acciones complementarias.
En Espa√±a el robo de m√≥viles no es un problema tan extendido, pero es cierto que es algo que pasa a diario, y una soluci√≥n como esta podr√≠a ser una gran ayuda para la gente que lo sufre. Por lo general, los tr√°mites no son muy complejos, pero es cierto que en funci√≥n de los horarios que se tengan en el trabajo puede ser ligeramente complicado llevarlos a cabo en algunas ocasiones.
Te puede interesar La funci√≥n que no conoces y deber√≠as usar si caminas usando el m√≥vil por la calle Tu m√≥vil te hace dormir peor: as√≠ debes configurarlo para descansar bien y luchar contra el insomnio Cinco consejos para comprar un m√≥vil y que te dure el m√°ximo tiempo posible Sigue los temas que te interesan Aplicaciones Brasil Espa√±a Robos Smartphones
